acupoint.standard_location: 在手掌尺侧，微握拳，当小指本节（第5掌指关节）后的远侧掌横纹头赤白肉际
acupoint.standard_location_en: On the ulnar side of the hand, proximal to the 5th metacarpophalangeal joint, at the end of the transverse crease, at the junction of the red and white skin
acupoint.simple_method: 握拳，小指根部关节后方，掌纹尽头处，红白肉交界处
acupoint.simple_method_en: Make a loose fist. Find the point at the end of the crease just below the pinky knuckle, where palm skin meets back-of-hand skin.
acupoint.anatomical: 在小指展肌起点外缘；有指背动静脉，手背静脉网；布有尺神经手背支
functions: 疏风清热 (dispel wind, clear heat)
舒筋活络 (relax sinews, activate collaterals)
